description: Sends a text message to a specific person using a selected platform on the specified device.

device.description: The device to be used for sending the message. Can be phone, PC, tablet, or laptop.

personName.description: The name of the person to send the message to. For example: Mom, John, Team Lead, etc.

messageMedia.description: The platform or medium to send the message through. Examples: SIM, WhatsApp, Instagram etc.

messageContent.description: The actual message text to be sent. For example: 'Meeting is at 3 PM', 'Happy Birthday!', etc.

examples: send happy birthday to mom on whatsapp from phone
message team lead that meeting is delayed via slack on laptop
text sundatam using sim from pc
send 'I'll be late' to dad on insta using tab
